resources.string: Place camera to object and keep steady

Koloni dengan percabangan arboresen, cabang dengan satu atau dua axial koralit. Percabangan tidak teratur dan mendekati kearah ujung membengkak, berbenjol-benjol tidak teratur. Radial koralit membulat tersebar rapat tidak beraturan, memiliki warna coklat muda dan mendekati ujung memutih
Jenis ini mudah dibedakan dari yang lain dengan ciri khas adanya benjolan-benjolan diujung dari percabangan yang kadang-kadang terdiri dari dua axial koralit.
Tersebar di seluruh perairan Indonesia, jenis ini sangat umum dijumpai di daerah tubir.

This project was a modified version of Bangkit project named: Coral-ID. In this app, I added new forum feature where the people can sent a new message on the forum. To use the app, the user need to change the source code url to the public server, so the application can make an API request into the server. To authenticate which user sent the message, I create a simple authentication feature (login, register, and logout) using JWT as it\'s token. On the server side, I create JWT token using simple-jwt library that was provided for the Django Rest Framework. The user also need to setup the yolov4 model for analyzing the corals. Here is the link for the source code and also the yolov4 model:\nhttps://github.com/nox237/Coral-ID dan https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pRzzqRgSdvXJPMRFsgw2WzAt2fGhGvcA/view?usp=sharing
For the original project, you can see on this link below:\nhttps://github.com/sayapakailinuxpak/Coral-ID
Hope the project can give you some insights.\nThanks! - Stephen Nicholas
